response.overview: In a world where walking, talking, digitally connected bots have become children's best friends, an 11-year-old finds that his robot buddy doesn't quite work the same as the others do.
response.tagline: Best Friend Forever* (*battery life may vary)
response.title: Ron's Gone Wrong

results.name: Rapid Questions with Zach Galifianakis and Jack Dylan Grazer
Interview with Sarah Smith & Peter Baynham
